Package com.peyrona.mingle.gum

Class RS2JsonStr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.gum.RS2JsonStr
  • public final class RS2JsonStr
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a welformed JSON string from passed ResultSet: the JSON is an array with two elements, being first element an array of Strings containing the column names and being second element an array which contais as many elements as rows were in the ResultSet, being rows elements the columns' values.

    As an example 

        { "head": ["ColName_1", "ColName_2", ... , "ColName_N" ],
      "body":[["Col_1_Val", "Col_2_Val", ... , "Col_N_Val" ],    Row 1
              ["Col_1_Val", "Col_2_Val", ... , "Col_N_Val" ],    Row 2
              ...........
              ["Col_1_Val", "Col_2_Val", ... , "Col_1_Val" ]] }  Row N

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RS2JsonStr​(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getAll()
      Returns head and body.
      java.lang.String getBody()
      Returns rows only (not head).
      java.lang.String getHead()
      Returns the JSON representation of an array containing the columns name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • RS2JsonStr

        public RS2JsonStr​(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                  java.lang.String... colNameWithJsonData)
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        rs - ResultSet to convert into JSON string. It will remain open after the process is finished: it is caller responsability to close it.
        colNameWithJsonData - All column's name for the columsn that contain JSON data: they have to be identified in order to be trated properly.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
